articles.title: Covid-19 cases in California climb to a record as state curfew begins - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The cases topped Friday’s record of 13,005 infections, bringing the total to almost 1.1 million. The number of deaths increased by 86 to 18,643, state data showed.
articles.content:
California added 15,442 new coronavirus cases, hitting a new high as the state’s evening curfew kicks in Saturday night.
